metadata.title: CVE-2024-50266 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:clk: qcom: videocc-sm8350: use HW_CTRL_TRIGGER for vcodec GDSCsA recent change in the venus driver results in a stuck clock on theLenovo ThinkPad X13s, for example, when streaming video in firefox:	video_cc_mvs0_clk status stuck at 'off'	WARNING: CPU: 6 PID: 2885 at drivers/clk/qcom/clk-branch.c:87clk_branch_wait+0x144/0x15c	...	Call trace:	 clk_branch_wait+0x144/0x15c	 clk_branch2_enable+0x30/0x40	 clk_core_enable+0xd8/0x29c	 clk_enable+0x2c/0x4c	 vcodec_clks_enable.isra.0+0x94/0xd8 [venus_core]	 coreid_power_v4+0x464/0x628 [venus_core]	 vdec_start_streaming+0xc4/0x510 [venus_dec]	 vb2_start_streaming+0x6c/0x180 [videobuf2_common]	 vb2_core_streamon+0x120/0x1dc [videobuf2_common]	 vb2_streamon+0x1c/0x6c [videobuf2_v4l2]	 v4l2_m2m_ioctl_streamon+0x30/0x80 [v4l2_mem2mem]	 v4l_streamon+0x24/0x30 [videodev]using the out-of-tree sm8350/sc8280xp venus support. [1]Update also the sm8350/sc8280xp GDSC definitions so that the hw controlmode can be changed at runtime as the venus driver now requires.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-50266` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 6.5.0-9.9
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 6.5.0-9.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 6.5.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 6.5.0-1007.7
No subscription required

No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 6.5.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 6.5.0-9.9.1
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 6.5.0-9.9.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 6.5.0-1010.10
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1003-oem - 6.8.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 6.5.0-1005.7
No subscription required

linux-image-6.7.0-2001-raspi-realtime - 6.7.0-2001.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-realtime - 6.8.0-1008.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

No subscription required
